Comment: Kentuckian here: we've been hit very consistently by terrible weather events over the last few years, something our (wonderful) governor has commented frequently on. Thankfully where I live hasn't been hugely impacted but areas of extreme flooding and tornados are all around me. It's horrible, but I have to agree that folks are getting what the majority of them voted for, and unfortunately they've still not realized it.Â    I don't want my neighbors to suffer, but it's hard not to be bitter about how they inflicted this on everyone here, and I'm just thankful that me and my family have all heretofore been spared (though my grandmother, who does not support Trump, came close to getting flooded).Â  Somehow we managed to vote in a Democratic governor who is great (hoping for a 2028 presidential run), but our Republican legislature barely lets him do anything.Â
